summary: Diff adds a new Motoko backend actor with profile/reading/alert types and access-control mixins, plus a new TanStack Router-based frontend with Patient and Control Room routes, Internet Identity auth UI, patient monitoring simulation controls, SOS alert creation UI, and control-room alert queue/status management with React Query polling. Some requirements cannot be fully verified due to truncation/omitted files (e.g., landing page content, backend method bodies, and generated image asset files).

hallucinated_features.description: Secret-token based access-control initialization via URL parameter (`caffeineAdminToken`) and a private/underscored backend initialization call (`_initializeAccessControlWithSecret`).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires allowlist-based access control with an authorized-user bootstrapping method callable by an existing authorized user, but does not request a URL-secret token bootstrap mechanism or a special initialization endpoint.
evidence: backend/main.mo (imports authorization mixins; initialization method not shown but implied by frontend call)

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in BuildRequest requirements or acceptance criteria.
